channel.title: ★ TeekX 667 | The Best 667 | Hiring Staff | Amazing Features! ★
channel.description:
[CENTER]NOTICE* The server is back online! as of 10/06/2014
[url=http://www.teekx.com][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/28tutxk.png[/img][/url]
[admin=Links] Links: [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/icon_homepage_zpsfcc29152.png[/img] Website:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://"http://www.teekx.com/"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/play_zps82372811.gif[/img] Webclient:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://"http://www.teekx.com/downloads/TeekX.jar"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE][B][SIZE=3] [/SIZE][/B][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img][SIZE=3][B] Forums:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.teekx.com/community"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE]
[/admin]
[ADMIN=Features] - Custom made tutorial, covers most content. - Advanced Slayer - Wealth Calculation for High Risk fighting - Perfect Dharok's Formula - Fully working granite gmaul. - Perfect combat formulas. - Void & Void elite effects - Duel Arena - Fully working prayer books - Fully working spell books - Correct multi zones - Improved combat system, rewritten methods. - Flawless switching - Ring of life - Mage Of Zamorak, with abyss - Runecrafting with points and a shop - Pure 666 cache. (2011 Style) - Perfect curse leeches, including leech special attack. - Custom quest tab interface which displays player statistics. - Lootshare system, advanced sharing for friends and PvM Clans - Upgradable weapons such as, dark bow, granite maul, armadyl godsword, dragon claws and bandos.[/admin]
[admin=PvM] - Tormented Demons - Corporeal beast - Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms - Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons - King Black Dragon - Bandos - Armadyl - Dagganoth kings - Several more![/admin]
[admin=Skilling] - Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape. - Achievements with rewards (We currently have 23/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/admin]
[admin=Information] TeekX is a 666 server, based off of RS 2011. We have amazing, unseen content which makes us unique. If want the perfect PvM and the best, possible Pking experience, try us out![/admin]
[size=14pt]Server Images[/size]
Target & EP System [img]http://i.gyazo.com/989bc376696ab2957c72ab2ee165951d.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/2d8de4db20382fd005a635a9cb7fa00a.png[/img]

[img]http://gyazo.com/1a0b8477a726d8684450d98b100b9d1f.png[/img]
Achievements:
[img]http://gyazo.com/5193883aa9cd23c01339a4ac65576a9f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/2415aaef043b0342b3938053ca29facd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/def03dd14036b9988cd162b4591cf15d.png[/img]
Starter [img]http://gyazo.com/e2a4863bb9487f3bddbde2cbe15aa763.png[/img]
How spawning works [img]http://gyazo.com/cb98e2fd6b8369bdc5abcde73851a5db.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/e408b398e21afc3b2e5254c11d7e8975.png[/img]
Correct Ancient Curses [img]http://gyazo.com/d04ecb4909ee64a7fea0c718f5c65cff.gif[/img]

Dharoks & Guthans Effects [img]http://gyazo.com/cde77b6181a40b9ff254e813a4a8688b.gif[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/71bb925e269947cd744f6cca0f4ae739.gif[/img]
Ring Of Life [img]http://gyazo.com/dbfbc159896754833a8f36c6201cb400.gif[/img]
Pking / Hybridding Pking
[img]http://gyazo.com/0528fc298ca1524d31baec776ff99c68.gif[/img]
Hybridding stacked dds hit
[img]http://gyazo.com/93daa2abb975479d6977580e456e55fc.gif[/img]
Target & EP System.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/989bc376696ab2957c72ab2ee165951d.png[/img]
[SIZE=7]MORE IMAGES TO COME![/SIZE]
Random Events Manager:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lGqhkQi_jo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
NPC Dicing:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rruZPIt9E2Y[/youtube]
New wilderness: No longer a ditch + reworked.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/ed86174424d8c1afedb96dc56145ebd7.gif[/img]
[admin=Server Updates]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/989bc376696ab2957c72ab2ee165951d.png[/img] [/admin]
Client Images 10/06/2014
- Added some new client packets which communicate with the servers loginhandler.
Invalid passwords:
old: [img]http://gyazo.com/8e6c7b4c141f37d7604a52c95e2de4f5.png[/img]
new: [img]http://gyazo.com/ad9f6ac2139f55cb3ba7ec160b06168e.png[/img]

[img]http://gyazo.com/7270d23b2fedcfac825821f95a78e4cb.png[/img]

[img]http://gyazo.com/3a5d07964b5650c3def7859959cf9939.png[/img]
And if you try to login with bad names.
[img]http://gyazo.com/9f6b983cba7a7d584b04dba6c189aceb.png[/img]
NEW: Weapons minigame, made from scratch. Based off of call of duty gungame. lol
[img]http://gyazo.com/0ead58ed0f8ccbd79c6fccd5f60ec1b6.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/2d97d74b2ea61916cac4c15751d09d3e.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

Goodluck with the server, looks nice.
+1 for your work by removing the wilderniss ditch, never seen that before.

item.description:
@yaboyteek wrote:

[CENTER]NOTICE* The server is back online! as of 10/06/2014

[admin=Links]
Links:
[B][SIZE=3] Website:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://“http://www.teekx.com/”]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE]

[ADMIN=Features]

  • Custom made tutorial, covers most content.
  • Advanced Slayer
  • Wealth Calculation for High Risk fighting
  • Perfect Dharok’s Formula
  • Fully working granite gmaul.
  • Perfect combat formulas.
  • Void & Void elite effects
  • Duel Arena
  • Fully working prayer books
  • Fully working spell books
  • Correct multi zones
  • Improved combat system, rewritten methods.
  • Flawless switching
  • Ring of life
  • Mage Of Zamorak, with abyss
  • Runecrafting with points and a shop
  • Pure 666 cache. (2011 Style)
  • Perfect curse leeches, including leech special attack.
  • Custom quest tab interface which displays player statistics.
  • Lootshare system, advanced sharing for friends and PvM Clans
  • Upgradable weapons such as, dark bow, granite maul, armadyl godsword, dragon claws and bandos.[/admin]

[admin=PvM]

  • Tormented Demons
  • Corporeal beast
  • Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms
  • Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons
  • King Black Dragon
  • Bandos
  • Armadyl
  • Dagganoth kings
  • Several more![/admin]

[admin=Skilling]

  • Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape.
  • Achievements with rewards
    (We currently have 23/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/admin]

[admin=Information]
TeekX is a 666 server, based off of RS 2011.
We have amazing, unseen content which makes us unique.
If want the perfect PvM and the best, possible Pking experience, try us out![/admin]
